title: 12/31/20 - HOUR-3 - Bucky Brooks & Athletes That Thrived During Miserable Year
itunes:title: 12/31/20 - HOUR-3 - Bucky Brooks & Athletes That Thrived During Miserable Year
description:
In Hour 3 of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, NFL veteran, former NFL scout and FOX Sports Radio host Bucky Brooks joins Colin to discuss the final week of the NFL regular season and if Philadelphia quarterback Carson Wentz can resurrect his career if he reunites with his former offensive coordinator, Frank Reich. Also, Colin breaks down his list of the top ten athletes who made the most of a miserable 2020.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
